autumn_quest_pixie.feywild.summon_messag: Wait, what’s this? You dare summon me while I am eating?$(n)$(n)How rude! There had better be a good reason for this! If my food is cold when I get back, we’re going to have some choice words!
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_01.complete.d: Wow, that was delicious! Not even our chefs are that good. You said that last meal was prepared by Chef Shaun? Please, give him my thanks!$(n)$(n)Listen, I would really like to help you, but despite the truce, our realm was recently attacked by the Cult of the Void. Our people arent very trusting at this time.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_01.start.desc: Oh, what’s that? You have some fishsticks in your pocket that you’re willing to give me?$(n)$(n)Well, I guess you seem like a good person. $(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Give the Pixie 5 Fish Sticks.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_02.complete.d: What an excellent workout. Thank you, I got the level I was hoping for.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_02.start.desc: You're after the Cult of the Void as well?$(n)$(n)Why don't we go fight some monsters together to see how we pair? I am really close to leveling up. Do you think we could go kill a few zombies? I'll analyze your fighting style so I can report back to Queen Titania. $(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Acquire 20 Rotten Flesh
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_03.complete.d: Oh wow, that taste even better than the fish sticks! I sure could get used to this.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_03.start.desc: Wow, I really hate to ask, but all that fighting took a lot out of me.$(n)$(n)Do you think that Chef Shaun would make me something to eat? I think some chicken tenders would really get my strength back. $(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Give the pixie 5 Chicken Tenders.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_04.complete.d: I just gave you some Concentrated Pixie Essence.$(n)$(n)With that, and your Manyullyn Ingots, we just need a few more things to make the Teleportation Orb: Feywild
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_04.start.desc: I've spoken with 'Queen Titania, and she’s willing to grant you an audience.$(n)$(n)If you want to travel to Feywild, you will need to get: 3 Manyullyn Ingots, 1 Witherite Ingot, 1 Sandstorm in a Bottle, and uh.. um.. 4 Concentrated Pixie Essence.. $(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Make 3 Manyullyn Ingots
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_05.complete.d: Wow, you're really strong! Hopefully Queen Mab sees what I see and choses to ally with you.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_05.start.desc: I think we should try to fight the Ancient Remnant first and get the Sandstorm in a Bottle. $(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Obtain a Sandstorm in a Bottle.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_06.complete.d: That was NOT easy. I am completely out of breath and all I did was just float here.$(n)$(n)That's it though. You have all the materials, now! Lets get back and make the Orb.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_06.start.desc: Now we just need to get a Witherite Ingot from the Harbinger, and we should have all the materials we need to get you to Feywild! $(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Acquire a Witherite Ingot.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_07.complete.d: The orb is fully attuned. All you have to do is use it!$(n)$(n)You can also take this Pixie Wing Tiara which will let you make your own Pixie wings. They are gonna look so good on you!
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_07.start.desc: Go ahead and craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild.$(n)$(n)I will attune it to Feywild once you’ve completed the craft. Then you can travel freely to our realm. $(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_08.complete.d: I bet they are gonna look great on you! Hurry up and try them on!
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_08.start.desc: Hey, friend. It's time to make your Pixie Wings. You can craft your own on the Fey Altar!$(n)$(n)You probably have most of what you need, but you may need to mine around in Feywild for a bit to get enough Fey Gem. $(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Craft the Pixie Wings.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_09.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_09.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_09.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_10.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_10.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_10.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_11.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_11.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_11.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_12.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_12.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_12.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.autumn.root.start.descript: Wait, what’s this? You dare summon me while I am eating? How rude! There had better be a good reason for this! If my food is cold when I get back, we’re going to have some choice words! You better have something good to say, or something delicious to eat!$(n)$(n)$(b;autumn)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Autumn Court!$()
quest.feywild.autumn.root.start.title: Interrupted Meal
quest.feywild.spring.quest_01.complete.d: Thank you! The soil feels happier already!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_01.start.desc: I see... you have also been attacked by the Cult of the Void and lost a village. It’s scary. Their corruption goes beyond just living people. The corruption is even destroying our crops, which is causing our seed supply to run thin. Would you happen to have any spare cabbage seeds that could help us regrow our fields? $(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Give the pixie some seeds
quest.feywild.spring.quest_02.complete.d: I've been listening to the crops and they seem pretty happy with their new start.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_02.start.desc: The fields are planted and we're currently waiting for them to grow. If our fertilizer didn't get destroyed, this process would go so much faster. Oh, whats that? You have some fertilizer you would like to give me? $(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Give the pixie some Mystical Fertilizer
quest.feywild.spring.quest_03.complete.d: Wow, that's amazing. Supremium Farmland?! You're incredible, friend!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_03.start.desc: With how much you've done already, I hate to ask for more. We are trying to restore another plot of land, but unfortunately the ground is completely dead. Think you could help us out with some farmland blocks? $(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Give the pixie some Supremium Farmland
quest.feywild.spring.quest_04.complete.d: With that Concentrated Pixie Dust that I gave you, and those Manyullyn Ingots, all thats left is to defeat the Harbinger, and Ancient Remnant.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_04.start.desc: You’ve shown such kindness. Queen Mab has requested an audience. Unfortunately, I won't be able to take you there directly. You’re going to need a couple of items from some hard-to-defeat bosses. In total, you’ll need 1 Witherite Ingot, 1 Sandstorm in a Bottle, 3 Manyullyn Ingots, and... oh... um... would you excuse me for just one moment? *the pixie wanders behind the building where you see a flash of glowing light* Here you go, this will be the first ingredient you need.  $(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Make 3 Manyullyn Ingots
quest.feywild.spring.quest_05.complete.d: Wow, you're really strong! Hopefully Queen Mab sees what I see and choses to ally with you.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_05.start.desc: I think we should try to fight the Ancient Remnant first and get the Sandstorm in a Bottle. $(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Acquire a Sandstorm in a Bottle.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_06.complete.d: That was NOT easy. I am completely out of breath and all I did was just float here. That's it though. You have all the materials!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_06.start.desc: Now we just need to get a Witherite Ingot from the Harbinger, and we should have all the materials we need to get you to Feywild! $(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Acquire a Witherite Ingot.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_07.complete.d: The orb is fully attuned. All you have to do is use it!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_07.start.desc: Go ahead and craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild. I will attune it to Feywild once you’ve completed the craft. Then you can travel freely to our realm. $(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_08.complete.d: I bet they are gonna look great on you! Hurry up and try them on!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_08.start.desc: Hey, friend. Did you know you can make some Pixie Wings on the Fey Altar? You probably have most of what you need, but you may need to mine around in Feywild for a bit to get enough Fey Gem. $(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Craft the Pixie Wings.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_09.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_09.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_09.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You

quest.feywild.spring.quest_19.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_19.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You

quest.feywild.spring.quest_20.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_20.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.spring.root.start.descript: Oh! Oh my! Did... did you just summon me? That’s quite sudden! I was tending my sprouts, but I suppose if you called me here, you must need my help. Lucky for you, Queen Mab and Queen Titania have called a temporary truce due to the havoc the Cult of the Void has caused upon our lands. I am happy to hear you out, but you’re going to need to replace this Diamond Hoe that got destroyed in transport, first. $(n)$(n)$(b;spring)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Spring Court!$()
quest.feywild.spring.root.start.title: Interrupted Gardening
quest.feywild.summer.quest_01.complete.d: Oh, that’s great. It fits even better than before!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_01.start.desc: Gosh, who carries beans around in their pocket, anyway? You're a monster! What’s that...? Cult of the Void, you say? We’re familiar with them. They are the reason that Queen Titania is currently working with Queen Mab. Both queens are stretched really thin right now as they try to clear the corrupted villages to ensure a zombie apocalypse doesn’t start. Hey, I meant to tell you — when you summoned me, my armor was damaged. Do you think you could bring me a Tertium Gemstone so I can repair it? $(n)$(n)$(summer)Objective: $()Give the pixie a Tertium Gemstone.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_02.complete.d: Think I can touch that wool? It looks really fluffy!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_02.start.desc: I’ve got a hankering for some battle to test it out. Let’s go beat up some sheep! $(n)$(n)$(summer)Objective: $()Obtain 25 Wool.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_03.complete.d: These are too squishy.. How about you hold on to these -hands you the Spider Eyes-
quest.feywild.summer.quest_03.start.desc: I think I saw a few creepy spiders off in that other direction over there. Lets go beat them up next! $(n)$(n)$(summer)Objective: $()Obtain 15 Spider Eyes.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_04.complete.d: I can't believe I had to make more essence. Anyways, with that Concentrated Pixie Essence I just gave you, plus the Manyullyn Ingots -- all you need is the hard stuff, now!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_04.start.desc: I was just speaking with Queen Titania and told her how you really helped me out, and that you are also having problems with the Cult of the Void. She would like to meet with you to potentially form an alliance, but we’re going to need to collect some items before you can get into Feywild. Would you mind turning around for a moment, please? *you hear the pixie making inaudible noises and a swirling sound*  $(n)$(n)$(summer)Objective: $()Make 3 Manyullyn Ingots.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_05.complete.d: Wow, you're really strong! Hopefully Queen Mab sees what I see and choses to ally with you.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_05.start.desc: I think we should try to fight the Ancient Remnant first and get the Sandstorm in a Bottle. $(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Acquire a Sandstorm in a Bottle.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_06.complete.d: That was NOT easy. I am completely out of breath and all I did was just float here. That's it though. You have all the materials!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_06.start.desc: Now we just need to get a Witherite Ingot from the Harbinger, and we should have all the materials we need to get you to Feywild! $(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Acquire a Witherite Ingot.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_07.complete.d: The orb is fully attuned. All you have to do is use it!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_07.start.desc: Go ahead and craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild. I will attune it to Feywild once you’ve completed the craft. Then you can travel freely to our realm. $(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_08.complete.d: I bet they are gonna look great on you! Hurry up and try them on!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_08.start.desc: Hey, friend. Did you know you can make some Pixie Wings on the Fey Altar? You probably have most of what you need, but you may need to mine around in Feywild for a bit to get enough Fey Gem. $(n)$(n)$(summer)Objective: $()Craft the Pixie Wings.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_09.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_09.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_09.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.summer.quest_10.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_10.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_10.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.summer.quest_11.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_11.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_11.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.summer.root.start.descript: Huh, what...? Where am I? Who are you? Can’t a pixie take a nap without being summoned to another realm!? You’d better have a good reason for bringing me here, or I am gonna curse your pepper crops so badly that your children’s children will feel like they are in a famine! Hey... hey, no need to bring out those refried beans! I have a major allergy! Why don’t you just hand those over to me for now, so I can make sure they are disposed of properly. $(n)$(n)$(b;summer)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Summer Court!$()
quest.feywild.summer.root.start.title: The Summer of Beans
quest.feywild.winter.root.start.descript: Are you serious? You summon me here? In the middle of my own business?! Unbelievable! Mortals have no sense of timing. If you're going to interrupt my day, at least make yourself useful and bring me something to clean myself. $(n)$(n)$(b;winter)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Winter Court!$()
quest.feywild.winter.root.start.title: Bad Timing
quest.feywild.winter.quest_01.complete.d: Three Seashells? Really?! I didn't realize your people were so classy! I think we're going to get along just fine. Tell me, what made you summon me to this realm?
quest.feywild.winter.quest_01.start.desc: Well? I'm waiting! $(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Give the Pixie the Three Seashells.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_02.complete.d: Oh this is perfect. We can start regrowing our fields, now!
quest.feywild.winter.quest_02.start.desc: The Cult of the Void? I see... We were recently attacked by them as well. Queen Mab and Queen Titania even called for a temporary truce while they clean the lands of Corruption. Unfortunately it's left our crop supply short. Think you could spare some seeds? $(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Give the Pixie 10 seeds.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_03.complete.d: That sure was delicious. I even shared some with Queen Mab. She says that if you're willing to bring more delacies like that, she will grant you an audience to discuss a potential alliance.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_03.start.desc: We've started growing the fields again and look forward to our first hot meal in weeks. What? You have some Carrot Soup you would like to give us? I guess it's better than dirt, so thank you! $(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Give the Pixie 10 Carrot Soup.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_04.complete.d: With that Concentrated Pixie Essence I gave you, and the 3 Manyullyn Ingots you made, all you need now is something from an Ancient Remnant, and the Harbinger..
quest.feywild.winter.quest_04.start.desc: To get into Feywild, you’re going to need some of these Concentrated Pixie Essences, as well as 1 Witherite Ingot, 1 Sandstorm in a Bottle, and 3 Manyullyn Ingots. $(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Make 3 Manyullyn Ingots.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_05.complete.d: Wow, you're really strong! Hopefully Queen Mab sees what I see and choses to ally with you.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_05.start.desc: I think we should try to fight the Ancient Remnant first and get the Sandstorm in a Bottle. $(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Kill an Ancient Remnant.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_06.complete.d: That was NOT easy. I am completely out of breath and all I did was just float here. That's it though. You have all the materials!
quest.feywild.winter.quest_06.start.desc: Now we just need to get a Witherite Ingot from the Harbinger, and we should have all the materials we need to get you to Feywild! $(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Kill the Harbinger.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_07.complete.d: The orb is fully attuned. All you have to do is use it!
quest.feywild.winter.quest_07.start.desc: Go ahead and craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild. I will attune it to Feywild once you’ve completed the craft. Then you can travel freely to our realm. $(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_08.complete.d: I bet they are gonna look great on you! Hurry up and try them on!
quest.feywild.winter.quest_08.start.desc: Hey, friend. Did you know you can make some Pixie Wings on the Fey Altar? You probably have most of what you need, but you may need to mine around in Feywild for a bit to get enough Fey Gem. $(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Craft the Pixie Wings.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_09.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_09.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_09.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.winter.quest_10.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_10.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_10.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.winter.quest_11.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_11.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_11.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
spring_quest_pixie.feywild.summon_messag: Where am I? Who are you? Are you tasty? Let's go on an adventure! You wanna play? ...I'm hungry!
summer_quest_pixie.feywild.summon_messag: How dare you summon me like I am some sort of magician's pet! You'd better know your place... Hmph!
